data: Ef ther’ ain’t a flare-up in _this_ haouse ’fore long, I miss _my_ guess,” said Alvira, as she kneaded the pie-crust, and pulled it out between her floury fingers to measure its consistency.
Seth's Brother's Wife: A Study of Life in the Greater New York
